alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 10:21PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jackson, northwestern Marshall, southern Madison, southeastern Limestone, Morgan and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 1100 PM CST... At 1021 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Skyline to 8 miles west of Falkville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Huntsville, Scottsboro, Hartselle, Bridgeport, Redstone Arsenal, Priceville, Stevenson, Owens Cross Roads, Falkville and Skyline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison; Marshall; Morgan
